data.title: Meetings & Weddings in Cabo at Hard Rock Hotel Los Cabos
data.meta_description: It's your chance to make an impression with the largest meeting and event spaces in Los Cabos (indoor and outdoor), ideal for banquets, themed parties, concerts and more!
data.text:
All-Inclusive and then some PUT THE SPOTLIGHT ON YOUR NEXT EVENT

It's your chance to make an impression with the largest meeting and event spaces in Los Cabos (indoor and outdoor), ideal for banquets, themed parties, concerts and more! Coincidentally, we've got 60,000 square feet of meeting and event space to do it. There’s the dedicated crew of event staff, unlimited dining, 5 pools, free-flowing cocktails, and all taxes and gratuity included. From weddings, honeymoons, and romantic escapes to meetings that redefine business. Now, let’s get to work.
